content: this easy peasy santa suit crochet coaster pattern makes double-thick coasters that are perfect for protecting tables from hot winter drinks like cider and hot cocoa > **this pattern is available for free on my blog here 1 ** > > the free version is supported by > advertising on my website the > downloadable pdf for sale on ravelry > includes the full pattern in one > printable file without advertisements **skills used** basic crochet stitches chain single_crochet crocheting flat in row crocheting in the back loop includes link to a video tutorial seaming with whipstitch changing colors includes video tutorials **skill level** easy **finished size** coaster 5 13 cm square **materials** queensland collection coastal cotton fine yarn 100% cotton 3 5 oz/100 g 350 yd/320 m 1 skein each in 2030 garnet ca 2001 jet cb and 2023 persimmon cc *or approximately 155 yd 142 m in ca 15 yd 14 m in cb and 5 yd 4 5 m in cc in any fine weight cotton yarn* us size 7-4 5 mm crochet hook *or any size needed to obtain correct gauge* stitch marker yarn needle **gauge** holding 2 strands of yarn together 16 single_crochet = 4 10 cm across *exact gauge is not critical for this project * 1 https //undergroundcrafter com/2025/11/12/santa-suit-crochet-coaster-pattern/
